text: @HillaryClinton Trump irresponsibly and inexplicably fired the entire Pandemic Awareness and Planning Team from the CDC in 2018. Their expertise & awareness of potential pandemic situations 24x7, 365 would have had the US engaged & prepared long before COVID-19 hit our shores.#TrumpDeathToll92K
